entities.name: ISRAELI TAX AUTHORITIES
entities.description: The Israeli Tax Authorities (ITA) are responsible for approving the Plan, the Sub-Plan, and the Trustee for the classification of Restricted Stock Units as Trustee 102 Awards.

entities.name: COMPANY
entities.description: The Company is responsible for granting Awards under the Israeli sub-plan, appointing a Trustee, and ensuring compliance with Section 102 of the Income Tax Ordinance and CGR.

entities.name: TRUSTEE
entities.description: The Trustee is appointed by the Company to control and manage the Awards and Common Stock for the benefit of the recipients, in compliance with the CGR and Trust Agreement.

relationships.relationship_description: The Company requires approval from the Israeli Tax Authorities for the classification of Restricted Stock Units as Trustee 102 Awards.
The Company appoints the Trustee to manage and control the Awards and shares of Common Stock for the benefit of the recipients.
